markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup>

Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.
name: Abjuration
